review_en: You can see Namsan Tower and Namsan from anywhere in Seoul. In the 1970s and 1980s, the site was transformed into a place where the cold image of Namsan Mountain could not be found. Many people are still visiting the area, and many tourists from around the world have visited it since a few years ago due to the Korean Wave. There are three main ways to go up to the Namsan Tower. 1. Walking 2. Cable Car 3. Bus taxis or private cars cannot climb Namsan due to the city's environmental policy. If you visited a little early, you could climb up to the park, walk down the street, and eat with Namsan king pork cutlet.

review_en: Namsan Mountain, located in the middle of Seoul, has long been known as the center of Seoul and one of Korea's representative mountains. Namsan Mountain has been transformed into a variety of attractions during the four seasons, and it is still standing beside us, making it an easy place for both men and women. The protection of Namsan Mountain, which has been carried out so far, is creating a natural harmony through the overall composition of the mountain, so I recommend you to go hiking here because you feel that you will feel different whenever you climb the mountain. Namsan is easy and fast.

review_en: Namsan Tower, a landmark that can be easily seen anywhere in Seoul, and cable cars, locks of love. If you were a couple in Korea, you would have dreamed of going on a date in Namsan at least once. You can easily get to Namsan by riding a cable car from Myeong-dong Station, or by taking Namsan circular buses from Dongdaegu Station, Chungmuro, and Itaewon. If you walk up the road for about 10 minutes, you can see Octagonal Pavilion, Namsan Fortress, and Namsan Tower. It's good to go up at night and see the night view, and to go up during the day and feel nature.
